TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WebManagementEvent extends System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent

summary.span: 为带有应用程序和进程信息的事件定义基类。

span.span: Defines the base class for events that carry application and process information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET health monitoring 允许生产和运营人员管理已部署的 Web 应用程序。ASP.NET health monitoring allows production and operations staff to manage deployed Web applications. 命名空间包含的运行状况事件类型负责打包应用程序运行状况数据，以及负责处理此数据的提供程序类型。The namespace contains the health-event types responsible for packaging application health-status data and the provider types responsible for processing this data. 它还包含在运行状况事件的管理过程中可帮助的支持类型。It also contains supporting types that help during the management of health events. 是所有 ASP.NET health 监视事件类型的基类。The is the base class for all the ASP.NET health-monitoring event types. 它使用 类来获取可用于其派生类的进程信息。It uses the class to obtain process information that is available to its derived classes. > [!NOTE] > 在大多数情况下，你将能够使用已实现的 ASP.NET health 监视类型，并且将通过在 "配置" 部分中指定值来控制运行状况监视系统 `healthMonitoring` 。In most cases you will be able to use the ASP.NET health-monitoring types as implemented, and you will control the health-monitoring system by specifying values in the `healthMonitoring` configuration section. 还可以从运行状况监视类型派生，以创建自己的自定义事件和提供程序。You can also derive from the health-monitoring types to create your own custom events and providers. 有关从类派生的示例 ，请参阅本主题中提供的示例。For an example of deriving from the class, see the example provided in this topic. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何通过从类派生来实现自定义事件 。The following example shows how to implement a custom event by deriving it from the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebManagementEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebManagementEvent/CS/webmanagementevent.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebManagementEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebManagementEvent/VB/webmanagementevent.vb#1)] 下面是配置文件的摘录，使 ASP.NET 可以使用自定义事件。The following is an excerpt of the configuration file that enables ASP.NET to use the custom event. ``` ```

para.span: 格式化要显示的自定义事件信息时，请重写 方法而不是 方法。

span.span: When formatting your custom event information for display, override the method rather than the method.

para.span: 这将避免覆盖或篡改敏感系统信息。

span.span: This will avoid overwriting or tampering with sensitive system information.

para.span: 为自定义事件指定的事件代码必须大于 。

span.span: The event code you specify for your custom event must be greater than .

related.span: ASP.NET 运行状况监视概述

summary.span: 获取有关 ASP.NET 应用程序承载进程的信息。

span.span: Gets information about the ASP.NET application-hosting process.
